\"mcp[cli]\"\u003c/code\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eImport FastMCP from \u003ccode\u003emcp.server.fastmcp\u003c/code\u003e: \u003ccode\u003efrom mcp.server.fastmcp import \u003ccode\u003e@mcp.prompt()\u003c/code\u003e decorators for registration\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eType hints are mandatory - they're used for schema generation and validation\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eUse Pydantic models, TypedDicts, or dataclasses for structured output\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eTools automatically return structured output when return types are compatible\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eFor stdio transport, use \u003ccode\u003emcp.run()\u003c/code\u003e or \u003ccode\u003emcp.run(transport=\"stdio\")\u003c/code\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eFor HTTP servers, use \u003ccode\u003emcp.run(transport=\"streamable-http\")\u003c/code\u003e or mount to Starlette/FastAPI\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eUse \u003ccode\u003eContext\u003c/code\u003e parameter in tools/resources to access MCP capabilities: \u003ccode\u003ectx: Context\u003c/code\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eSend logs with \u003ccode\u003eawait ctx.debug()\u003c/code\u003e, \u003ccode\u003eawait ctx.info()\u003c/code\u003e, \u003ccode\u003eawait ctx.warning()\u003c/code\u003e, \u003ccode\u003eawait ctx.error()\u003c/code\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eReport progress with \u003ccode\u003eawait ctx.report_progress(progress, total, message)\u003c/code\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eRequest user input with \u003ccode\u003eawait ctx.elicit(message, schema)\u003c/code\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eUse LLM sampling with \u003ccode\u003eawait ctx.session.create_message(messages, max_tokens)\u003c/code\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eConfigure icons with \u003ccode\u003eIcon(src=\"path\", mimeType=\"image/png\")\u003c/code\u003e for server, tools, resources, prompts\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eUse \u003ccode\u003eImage\u003c/code\u003e class for automatic image handling: \u003ccode\u003ereturn Image(data=bytes, format=\"png\")\u003c/code\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eDefine resource templates with URI patterns: \u003ccode\u003e@mcp.resource(\"greeting://{name}\")\u003c/code\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eImplement completion support by accepting partial values and returning <div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h1 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Python MCP Server Development</h1><a id="user-content-python-mcp-server-development" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Python MCP Server Development" href="#python-mcp-server-development"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Instructions</h2><a id="user-content-instructions" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Instructions" href="#instructions"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>Use <strong>uv</strong> for project management: <code>uv init mcp-server-demo</code> and <code>uv add "mcp[cli]"</code></li>
<li>Import FastMCP from <code>mcp.server.fastmcp</code>: <code>from mcp.server.fastmcp import FastMCP</code></li>
<li>Use <code>@mcp.tool()</code>, <code>@mcp.resource()</code>, and <code>@mcp.prompt()</code> decorators for registration</li>
<li>Type hints are mandatory - they're used for schema generation and validation</li>
<li>Use Pydantic models, TypedDicts, or dataclasses for structured output</li>
<li>Tools automatically return structured output when return types are compatible</li>
<li>For stdio transport, use <code>mcp.run()</code> or <code>mcp.run(transport="stdio")</code></li>
<li>For HTTP servers, use <code>mcp.run(transport="streamable-http")</code> or mount to Starlette/FastAPI</li>
<li>Use <code>Context</code> parameter in tools/resources to access MCP capabilities: <code>ctx: Context</code></li>
<li>Send logs with <code>await ctx.debug()</code>, <code>await ctx.info()</code>, <code>await ctx.warning()</code>, <code>await ctx.error()</code></li>
<li>Report progress with <code>await ctx.report_progress(progress, total, message)</code></li>
<li>Request user input with <code>await ctx.elicit(message, schema)</code></li>
<li>Use LLM sampling with <code>await ctx.session.create_message(messages, max_tokens)</code></li>
<li>Configure icons with <code>Icon(src="path", mimeType="image/png")</code> for server, tools, resources, prompts</li>
<li>Use <code>Image</code> class for automatic image handling: <code>return Image(data=bytes, format="png")</code></li>
<li>Define resource templates with URI patterns: <code>@mcp.resource("greeting://{name}")</code></li>
<li>Implement completion support by accepting partial values and returning suggestions</li>
<li>Use lifespan context managers for startup/shutdown with shared resources</li>
<li>Access lifespan context in tools via <code>ctx.request_context.lifespan_context</code></li>
<li>For stateless HTTP servers, set <code>stateless_http=True</code> in FastMCP initialization</li>
<li>Enable JSON responses for modern clients: <code>json_response=True</code></li>
<li>Test servers with: <code>uv run mcp dev server.py</code> (Inspector) or <code>uv run mcp install server.py</code> (Claude Desktop)</li>
<li>Mount multiple servers in Starlette with different paths: <code>Mount("/path", mcp.streamable_http_app())</code></li>
<li>Configure CORS for browser clients: expose <code>Mcp-Session-Id</code> header</li>
<li>Use low-level Server class for maximum control when FastMCP isn't sufficient</li>
</ul>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Best Practices</h2><a id="user-content-best-practices" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Best Practices" href="#best-practices"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>Always use type hints - they drive schema generation and validation</li>
<li>Return Pydantic models or TypedDicts for structured tool outputs</li>
<li>Keep tool functions focused on single responsibilities</li>
<li>Provide clear docstrings - they become tool descriptions</li>
<li>Use descriptive parameter names with type hints</li>
<li>Validate inputs using Pydantic Field descriptions</li>
<li>Implement proper error handling with try-except blocks</li>
<li>Use async functions for I/O-bound operations</li>
<li>Clean up resources in lifespan context managers</li>
<li>Log to stderr to avoid interfering with stdio transport (when using stdio)</li>
<li>Use environment variables for configuration</li>
<li>Test tools independently before LLM integration</li>
<li>Consider security when exposing file system or network access</li>
<li>Use structured output for machine-readable data</li>
<li>Provide both content and structured data for backward compatibility</li>
</ul>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Common Patterns</h2><a id="user-content-common-patterns" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Common Patterns" href="#common-patterns"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>

@mcp.tool()
async def process_data(
    data: str, 
    ctx: Context[ServerSession, None]

<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Tool with Sampling</h3><a id="user-content-tool-with-sampling" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Tool with Sampling" href="#tool-with-sampling"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-python notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="from mcp.server.fastmcp import Context
from mcp.server.session import ServerSession
from mcp.types import SamplingMessage, TextContent

@mcp.tool()
async def summarize(
    text: str,
    ctx: Context[ServerSession, None]
) -&gt; str:
    &quot;&quot;&quot;Summarize text using LLM&quot;&quot;&quot;
    result = await ctx.session.create_message(
        messages=[SamplingMessage(
            role=&quot;user&quot;,
            content=TextContent(type=&quot;text&quot;, text=f&quot;Summarize: {text}&quot;)
        )],
        max_tokens=100
    )
    return result.content.text if result.content.type == &quot;text&quot; else &quot;&quot;"><pre><span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s1">mcp</span>.<span class="pl-s1">server</span>.<span class="pl-s1">fastmcp</span> <span class="pl-k">import</span> <span class="pl-v">Context</span>
<span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s1">mcp</span>.<span class="pl-s1">server</span>.<span class="pl-s1">session</span> <span class="pl-k">import</span> <span class="pl-v">ServerSession</span>
<span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s1">mcp</span>.<span class="pl-s1">types</span> <span class="pl-k">import</span> <span class="pl-v">SamplingMessage</span>, <span class="pl-v">TextContent</span>

<span class="pl-en">@<span class="pl-s1">mcp</span>.<span class="pl-c1">tool</span>()</span>
<span class="pl-k">async</span> <span class="pl-k">def</span> <span class="pl-en">summarize</span>(
    <span class="pl-s1">text</span>: <span class="pl-smi">str</span>,
    <span class="pl-s1">ctx</span>: <span class="pl-v">Context</span>[<span class="pl-smi">ServerSession</span>, <span class="pl-c1">None</span>]
) <span class="pl-c1">-&gt;</span> <span class="pl-smi">str</span>:
    <span class="pl-s">"""Summarize text using LLM"""</span>
    <span class="pl-s1">result</span> <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-k">await</span> <span class="pl-s1">ctx</span>.<span class="pl-c1">session</span>.<span class="pl-c1">create_message</span>(
        <span class="pl-s1">messages</span><span class="pl-c1">=</span>[<span class="pl-en">SamplingMessage</span>(
            <span class="pl-s1">role</span><span class="pl-c1">=</span><span class="pl-s">"user"</span>,
            <span class="pl-s1">content</span><span class="pl-c1">=</span><span class="pl-en">TextContent</span>(<span class="pl-s1">type</span><span class="pl-c1">=</span><span class="pl-s">"text"</span>, <span class="pl-s1">text</span><span class="pl-c1">=</span><span class="pl-s">f"Summarize: <span class="pl-s1"><span class="pl-kos">{</span><span class="pl-s1">text</span><span class="pl-kos">}</span></span>"</span>)
        )],
        <span class="pl-s1">max_tokens</span><span class="pl-c1">=</span><span class="pl-c1">100</span>
    )
    <span class="pl-k">return</span> <span class="pl-s1">result</span>.<span class="pl-c1">content</span>.<span class="pl-c1">text</span> <span class="pl-k">if</span> <span class="pl-s1">result</span>.<span class="pl-c1">content</span>.<span class="pl-c1">type</span> <span class="pl-c1">==</span> <span class="pl-s">"text"</span> <span class="pl-k">else</span> <span class="pl-s">""</span></pre></div>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Lifespan Management</h3><a id="user-content-lifespan-management" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Lifespan Management" href="#lifespan-management"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-python notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="from contextlib import asynccontextmanager
from dataclasses import dataclass
from mcp.server.fastmcp import FastMCP, Context

@dataclass
class AppContext:
    db: Database

@asynccontextmanager
async def app_lifespan(server: FastMCP):
    db = await Database.connect()
    try:
        yield AppContext(db=db)
    finally:
        await db.disconnect()

mcp = FastMCP(&quot;My App&quot;, lifespan=app_lifespan)

def query(sql: str, ctx: Context) -&gt; str:

    db = ctx.request_context.lifespan_context.db
